mapper.select: SELECT RECEIVING_MANAGEMENT.*, company_and_product_temp.*, receiving_company_list.*, product_temp.*, inventory.* FROM RECEIVING_MANAGEMENT JOIN company_and_product_temp ON RECEIVING_MANAGEMENT.COMPANY_AND_PRODUCT_TEMP_SEQ = company_and_product_temp.COMPANY_AND_PRODUCT_TEMP_SEQ JOIN receiving_company_list ON company_and_product_temp.COMPANY_SEQ = receiving_company_list.COMPANY_SEQ JOIN product_temp ON company_and_product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ = product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN inventory ON product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ = inventory.PRODUCT_SEQ

SELECT company_and_product_temp.COMPANY_AND_PRODUCT_TEMP_SEQ, company_and_product_temp.COMPANY_SEQ, company_and_product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ, product_temp.PRODUCT_CODE, product_temp.PRODUCT_NAME, product_temp.PRODUCT_PRICE, receiving_company_list.COMPANY_NAME, inventory.PRODUCT_AMOUNT FROM company_and_product_temp JOIN product_temp ON company_and_product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ = product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ JOIN receiving_company_list ON receiving_company_list.COMPANY_SEQ = company_and_product_temp.COMPANY_SEQ LEFT OUTER JOIN inventory ON inventory.PRODUCT_SEQ = product_temp.PRODUCT_SEQ
SELECT COMPANY_NAME, COMPANY_EMPLOYEE, ADDRESS FROM RECEIVING_COMPANY_LIST WHERE COMPANY_SEQ = #{COMPANY_SEQ}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECEIVING_MANAGEMENT ( TRADE_SEQ, TRADE_CODE, REQUEST_DATE, REQUEST_PERSON, REQUEST_ADDR, COMPANY_AND_PRODUCT_TEMP_SEQ, REQUEST_AMOUNT, PRODUCT_ALL_PRICE, LOT, SIGN_STATUS ) VALUES ( TRADE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{trade_code}, #{request_date}, #{request_person}, #{request_addr}, #{company_and_product_temp_seq}, #{request_amount}, #{product_all_price}, 'PD'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')||'LOT', '결재대기' )
